description: Generated when a PAD resource usage has gone above the threshold value.
The type indicates the type reseource.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-DSP-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusPadThresholdNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-DSP-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusPadThresholdType i 1 SONUS-DSP-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusPadThresholdState i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

$SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-DSP-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusPadThresholdNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-DSP-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusPadThresholdType i 1 SONUS-DSP-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusPadThresholdState i 2 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: The shelf index of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex

description: Type of resource usage that caused a threshold crossing trap
variables.name: SONUS-DSP-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusPadThresholdType

description: State of threshold, indicates whether threshold is on or off
variables.name: SONUS-DSP-RESOURCES-MIB::sonusPadThresholdState

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel
